## Calendar.getWeekdayText() method

Returns a list of weekday labels

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getWeekdayText(): {
        text: string;
        abbr?: string;
    }[];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

{ text: string; abbr?: string; }\[\]

An array of weekday text and full text if abbreviated
